 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּט‎</span>] **verb** ==dangle, shake== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוט‎</span>] Aph\`el ***scare***, sld., [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>ChWB ii. 97</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>Dict. 886</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a bag hanging down***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***suspend, hang***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּנוּט‎</span> [[Ps.99.1|Ps 99:1]] ***let*** (the earth) ***shake*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַז‎</span>). — [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#We|We]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמוּג‎</span>. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוית‎</span> see below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוה‎</span>.
